PantexTextureExtraction|out
Computes Pantex textural features on the selected channel of the input image
Feature Extraction
QgsProcessingParameterRasterLayer|in|Input Image|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|channel|Selected Channel|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|1|True
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|out|Output Image|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|min|Image minimum|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|max|Image maximum|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|sradx|Window radius (x direction)|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|4|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|srady|Window radius (y direction)|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|4|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|nbin|Number of bins per axis for histogram generation|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|8|True
*QgsProcessingParameterEnum|outputpixeltype|Output pixel type|uint8;int;float;double|False|2|True
